text:
The Nifty Futures on the Singapore Exchange, an early indicator of Nifty performance in India, is little changed at 8,606.Here are all the stocks to watch in trade today
Ultratech Cement: CCI Aditya Birla Group-controlled firm’s Rs 16,189 crore deal with Jaiprakash AssociatesIndian Overseas Bank: To consider preferential issue August 16Sunil Hitech Engineers: Announces 1:10 stock splitGAIL: Places order for Auraiya-Phulpur pipelineTata Chemicals: To evaluate options for potash operations based on partnerMahindra & Mahindra: Says autonomous tractors can boost farm productivity, sees self-driving future in farmsBharat Heavy Electricals (BHEL): Government to provide one-time budgetary support of Rs 900 croreTVS Electronics: Appoints Karthi Chandramouli as vice president finance and chief financial officerBajaj Finance: Allots NCDs worth Rs 160 croreHSIL: Approves demerger of retail businessNTPC: Commissions 50 MW of NP Kunta Ultra Mega Solar Power Project Stage-I in AnantapuramuSiti Cable Network: To be renamed as Siti Networks LimitedLupin: Gets USFDA nod for potassium deficiency treatment drugIFCI: Reduces lending rate by 0.1 percent to 9.3 percent






Read: Ricoh India’s Minority Shareholders Fail to Unseat Four Directors From Board
title: Stocks to Watch: Grasim Industries, Bank of Baroda, Lupin and More
